item.title: $ sudo make my summer thrilling
item.description: How one of the worst semester turned out the absolutely horrible… really exciting news at the end though!!! It’s been a while since I posted or blogged about something. This year is one of the most tragic and hard-hitting year for all of us, I don’t want to stretch over current situation so lets jump straight on to my worst experience with any semester till now. The worst thing for me, personally is the ongoing semester which is taking forever to end.
